timeline.message:
[567541] Make "refresh all sub representation" more reliable

- close all editors before refreshing all representation otherwise the
opened editors won't be refreshed.
- report properly when the refresh of a representation failed. That may
happen if an exception is raised either in OpeningDiagramJob or
indirectly in the refresh done on the UI thread.
- add log info in "Information" view
- log only a summary in error log view

Change-Id: I348c80164a2fcea38d644459de523faab10fd4fe
Signed-off-by: Laurent Fasani <laurent.fasani@obeo.fr>

[567909] Improve analysis selector to be more user friendly

There as been some improvement on the analysis selector to be more user
friendly. As the one provided in Capella was better that the one in
Sirius, it was made as a class (instead of a nested class) so it could
be reused properly.
Furthermore, the move representation actions have been modified. Instead
of having an action for each available aird file, there is now only one
action that displays the analysis selector.

Bug:567909
Change-Id: I8398171709a09548a863fd8edd1d163addc2b3a6
Signed-off-by: Steve Monnier <steve.monnier@obeo.fr>
Signed-off-by: Laurent Fasani <laurent.fasani@obeo.fr>
